DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy oral aliskiren therapy diabetic macular edema
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Aliskiren Treatment Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Type 1 type 2 diabetes Diabetic macular edema Exclusion criterion : Recent intraocular surgery study eye ( e.g. , cataract surgery last 6 month ) Recent laser photocoagulation study eye Recent treatment Avastin , Lucentis , intravitreal corticosteroid study eye Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion apply
